attorney.question: <div class="form-group"><label for="XXXXXXXXXX">The plantiff's relationship to the property in question is as the </label><button class="btn btn-primary plantiff" id="INPUT ID">Owner</button><button class="btn btn-primary plantiff" id="INPUT ID">Other</button>

<div class="form-group"><label for="XXXXXXXXXX">and I need to process and deliver eviction paperwork to evict a/an </label><button class="btn btn-primary defendent" id="INPUT ID">Individual</button><button class="btn btn-primary plantiff" id="INPUT ID">Business</button>

<div class="form-group"><label for="XXXXXXXXXX">and what type of property? </label><button class="btn btn-primary defendant" id="INPUT ID">Residential</button><button class="btn btn-primary defendant" id="INPUT ID">Commercial</button>
